sense.def:
To flatter someone
pomeni nekoga pretirano hvaliti, da mu ustrežemo ali ga pregovorimo, da nekaj stori.

seg.quote: Ginny knew that he was saying all this just to flatter her.

sense.def:
To be flattered by something
pomeni biti zadovoljen, ker se zaradi nečesa počutimo pomembne.

seg.quote: I was flattered that he remembered my name.

sense.def:
To flatter oneself that something is the case
pomeni verjeti o sebi nekaj dobrega, čeprav morda zmotno.

seg.quote: I flatter myself on being a good judge of character.
